named-query.name: BC_READ_PRICE_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT priceList FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.pricelist.domain.PriceListImpl priceList WHERE priceList.priceKey = :key

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRICE_LIST_BY_CURRENCY_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT priceList FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.pricelist.domain.PriceListImpl priceList WHERE priceList.currencyCode = :currency

named-query.name: BC_READ_DEFAULT_PRICE_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT priceList FROM org.broadleafcommerce.common.pricelist.domain.PriceListImpl priceList WHERE priceList.useDefaultIfNotFound = true
